titles.title: To provide an emergency cost-of-living increase for Social Security benefits for 2010.
To provide an emergency cost-of-living increase for Social Security benefits for 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to prescribe a formula for an emergency cost-of-living increase for Social Security benefits for calendar 2010.
